children.value: Quando inizi a esercitarti per la prima volta, il computer non sa nulla delle tue capacità di battitura, quindi per generare le parole utilizza un piccolo insieme delle lettere più comuni come «

». Tutte le parole generate saranno costituite da questo piccolo insieme di lettere, mentre le lettere rimanenti rimarranno inutilizzate. Poiché le statistiche per le lettere sono sconosciute, gli indicatori corrispondenti sono grigi.

02ggYA.value: For the purpose of typing measurement, each word is standardized to be five characters or keystrokes in English, including spaces and punctuation.

children.value: This web application will help you to learn
which means typing through muscle memory without using your eyesight to find the keys. It can improve your typing speed and accuracy dramatically. The opposite is
, a method of typing in which you look at the keyboard instead of the screen, and use only the index fingers.
This is a short tutorial that will explain how this application works.
You can use the left and right arrow keys to navigate through these slides.

2Whbla.value: Ripeti ogni parola due volte. Digita una parola per la prima volta per sviluppare la tua memoria muscolare. Digitare la stessa parola una seconda volta dovrebbe essere più semplice.

children.value: These charts visualize the efficiency of different keyboard layouts. An efficiency is a measure of how easy it is to type on a keyboard.
The circles show relative key frequencies, and the arcs show relative key pair frequencies.

It is easier to type when the most frequent keys are on the home row, and when the most frequent key pairs are typed with different fingers and hands. Therefore an efficient layout has the largest circles on the home row. It also has arcs that are evenly distributed across the keyboard, long and horizontal, rather than short and diagonal, because it indicates the frequent switching of fingers and hands.

3UivpT.value: Competi contro altri giocatori in questo gioco multiplayer online. Più velocemente digiti, più veloce va la tua macchina. Scrivi il più velocemente possibile per vincere la gara!

3iSUxP.value: Sort letters in such a way that the letters from the home row come first, then the letters from the top row, and finally all the remaining letters. Home row is the row with the CapsLock key. Top row is the row with the Tab key. It is easier and faster to type when your fingers do not need to move away from the home row. This feature works best with optimized layouts, like Dvorak or Colemak. In the Qwerty layout, the only vowel on the home row is A, so it severely limits the choice of words, and the algorithm will use more pseudo-words than usual.

3l9Ko2.value: The target speed is used to measure the confidence level and the color of a letter. The closer to the target speed, the greener. In the guided mode a letter is only unlocked when you pass a target speed threshold. When you unlock all letters, you can increase the target speed to go back to the learning mode and unlock the letters again, this time with a higher speed threshold. We recommend to increase the target speed in modest steps only when you have all letters above the target speed.

426G6p.value: Mostra una visita guidata con diapositive di aiuto.

children.value: Initially it starts generating words from a small subset of the most frequent letters in the alphabet.

When you are typing these words, the application measures the time-to-type metric for every letter in that subset. This time is used to measure your learning progress. The more familiar you become with a letter, the less time it takes for you to type it.
Once you familiarize yourself with the entire current subset of letters, the algorithm expands it by adding more and more letters to the subset.
This web application will help you to learn
, which means typing through muscle memory without using your eyesight to find the keys on the keyboard. It can improve your typing speed and accuracy dramatically. The opposite is
, a method of typing in which you look at the keyboard instead of the screen, and use only the index fingers.

children.value: Gioco di digitazione multi giocatore online
Competi contro altri giocatori in questo gioco di digitazione multi giocatore online. Più velocemente digiti, più veloce va la tua macchina. Scrivi il più velocemente possibile per vincere la gara!

9tN2Kd.value: Conta i caratteri e le parole del tuo testo.

children.value: This application uses a unique approach. It employs statistics and smart algorithms to automatically create typing lessons that match your current skill level. It works by repeating the following cycle:

The algorithm generates a list of random words for you, based on your typing skills. Your skill level is measured using the typing statistics collected so far. The words consist of a set of letters selected by the algorithm.
You type the given words. You try to make as few mistakes as possible.

As you type, the algorithm collects your typing statistics, such as the time-to-type metric for each individual key. At the end, these statistics are used to generate the next list of words for step one.
At each stage you just type the provided lists of words, and the computer does the rest.

AYmbiu.value: , da 35 a 70 WPM dopo 2 ore e 20 minuti di pratica nel corso di 12 giorni.

AaEaaB.value: Attiva la modalità a schermo intero.

B8IDW7.value: Use the dictionary words as much as possible, and if not many such words are available, then use computer-generated pseudo-words. Natural words might be easier to type. Pseudo-words offer a much greater variety of letter combinations. If this option is enabled, you will see more pseudo-words in the beginning, when the letter list is short. However, as you unlock few more letters, there is a good chance that only the dictionary words will be used.

C7qaXS.value: Il source code di keybr.com è disponibile su Github.

CLBu+I.value: , dopo 2 ore e 10 minuti di pratica nel corso di 11 giorni, la tua velocità di scrittura è rimasta a circa 70 WPM (che è abbastanza alta) ma la tua precisione è aumentata.

» è la lettera obiettivo e appare in ogni parola generata. Di nuovo, il colore dell’indicatore di questa lettera è grigio perché le sue statistiche di digitazione sono sconosciute.

children.value: Our teaching method is based on these principles:
No boring repetitive exercises. Unlike most other typing tutors, this application does not force you to repeat the same lessons like ‘
’ over and over again. This is very annoying and contributes very little to your overall learning.

This application uses a sophisticated computer algorithm to generate typing lessons that match your skill level. These lessons consist of random words generated using a subset of the full alphabet of letters. The size of the subset and individual letter frequency is controlled by the algorithm, which provides you with the best learning experience.

G89OM3.value: Adjust the amount of capital letters added to the lesson text. Use this option to practice typing the capital letters. We recommend to increase this value only if you have all letters above the target speed.

children.value: Crea un account per conservare i tuoi dati di scrittura sui nostri server nel cloud. Questo ti permette di accedere al tuo profilo da qualsiasi computer o browser. Se non hai un account i tuoi dati saranno conservati localmente e saranno accessibili solamente dal tuo computer attuale.
Noi non conserviamo nessuna password, bensì usiamo un servizio di terze parti per verificare i nostri utenti. Vi offriamo vari modi per creare un account e accedervi.
Puoi cancellarne uno in un qualsiasi momento. Cancellare un account è facile quanto crearne uno.

children.value: This indicator shows details about the letter with increased frequency, which is currently included in every generated word:
Your best typing speed for this individual letter.

A number in range from zero to one which is computed using your typing speed, and indicates your familiarity with this letter. A letter is considered fully learned when it’s confidence level reaches one.
How your typing speed is changing with each lesson.
The right way to use keyboard
Put all your fingers on the home row, the one containing the
key. There are small bumps on the keys ‘
’, put your index fingers on the bumps. Each finger is responsible for its own set of keys, as explained in the next illustration.

children.value: This application generates random but readable and pronounceable words, using the phonetic rules of your native language. These words look almost natural, and often are. Typing sensible text is much easier than repeating random letters, and it helps you remember frequent key combinations. The latest point is crucial. For example, it’s almost impossible for the letter ‘
’ in English, and you will never type such a combination in this application. Instead, you will type more common words, such as ‘
’, and so on. Soon you will learn how to type the ‘
The words are generated from the letters which are selected using the following rules.

children.value: When the algorithm includes a new letter to the current subset, the frequency of this letter is artificially increased so that it will be included in every generated word of a lesson.
The algorithm can also artificially rearrange letter frequencies, placing an emphasis on the letters with the worst time-to-type metric.
This means you will always be typing the letters that you are least familiar with.

This is the virtual keyboard. It helps you memorize key positions. Use it to find the keys and try not to look at your physical keyboard. There are small bumps on the

keys of your keyboard. Use these to correctly position your index fingers without having to look at the keys. Once your index fingers are in the right position you will be able to locate the remainder of the keys.

If you are persistent enough, sooner or later all the letters will become green. Congratulations, you have achieved your main goal! However, this does not mean that you should stop learning, you can keep going for as long as you wish.

children.value: This is the typing score indicator in abstract points and the difference from the average value.

The score is calculated from your typing speed, error count, and the current size of the letter set. The formula is designed to reward for typing speed, and punish for error count. You cannot obtain a high score by typing fast while also making many errors.
Users who score the highest points are recorded in the high score table.

ruJxBM.value: Percentuale di tasti digitati nella riga Tab, un numero basso è meglio.

children.value: The table of the fastest typists for the last few days, arranged by their scores from best to worst. Typing score is measured from typing speed, text length, the number of different characters in the text, and the number of errors. The formula is designed in such a way to reward for a faster speed, longer text and a larger alphabet, but to punish for the number of errors.

This is the text board. It displays the text to type out. The text changes for each new lesson. The text is generated automatically from the current subset of letters. Most of the words are not real, but are generated using the phonetic rules of your language so they sound natural and should be easy to pronounce. Besides being funny, this gives us the flexibility to use more words than actually exist.
per sbloccare funzionalità aggiuntive e godere di un’esperienza senza pubblicità. Ecco la lista dei benefici dell’account premium:

I tracciamenti arrivano inevitabilmente con pubblicità. Rimuovi tutti i tracciamenti per una privacy in rete completa.
Le pubblicità ci mettono un bel po’ a caricare. Cacciarle significa tempi di caricamento più veloci per tutte le pagine.

xlxLJr.value: When you focus on a new key, it is very likely that the speed of previous keys will decrease. If this option is disabled, you unlock a new key by raising only the focused key above the target speed. If this option is enabled, you will have to raise the focused key and all the previous keys above the target speed. This will make unlocking new keys harder. However, this will also make forgetting old keys harder.

ymqrw4.value: La tua velocità massima dis empre batte il

zCMj9s.value: Fai una prova di digitazione, esercitati in lezioni di digitazione, impara a digitare più velocemente.

children.value: Quando inizi a digitare le parole generate, il computer raccoglie le tue statistiche di digitazione. Gli indicatori iniziano a cambiare colore dal rosso al verde. Il colore rosso indica che la velocità di digitazione per quel singolo tasto è lenta e il colore verde indica il contrario. In questa fase il tuo obiettivo è rendere verdi tutte le lettere migliorando la velocità di digitazione. Tieni presente che in questo esempio, la lettera «

» è evidenziata poiché ha la peggiore metrica della velocità di digitazione, quindi diventa la lettera obiettivo. La lettera obiettivo è inclusa in ogni parola generata e questa è un’informazione cruciale da conoscere. Significa che in ogni momento ti stai esercitando sull’esatto tasto che ti dà più problemi.
